summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6280 for the improvement of North 35th St. from Evanston Ave. North to 1st Ave. Northwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 91937, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
